t: Create AI-optimized TV advertising campaigns with Brand+ | Amazon Ads
s: January 27, 2025 - Amazon Ads has introduced Brand+, a new AI-driven capability that helps brands reach more customers through streaming TV and online video advertising campaigns.

t: Why IHOP Rode With Dale Earnhardt Jr. In Amazon NASCAR Debut
s: IHOP already had Amazon Prime Video and Thursday Night Football on its sponsorship plate, but it wanted to sweeten the proposition by targeting young families on the go. With that in mind, Amazon pointed out that Dale Earnhardt Jr. and NASCAR had room in the passenger seat for another brand.

t: Nike eats humble pie as the brand returns to Amazon after six years | News briefs | Sporting Goods Intelligence
s: 1 day ago - According to several media reports, Nike's products will once again be sold on Amazon's platform following a five-year hiatus.

t: Brand+ and Performance+ Now Available in Amazon DSP Globally | Amazon Ads

t: Major car brand becomes first automaker to offer cars on Amazon with new online showroom
s: Skoda has made automotive history by becoming the first European car brand to launch an Amazon showroom that integrates real-time stock availability

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon

t: Amazon Ads Launches Brand+, A Way For Marketers To Leverage Shopping, Browsing And Streaming Data From Amazon’s Total Footprint
s: January 27, 2025 - Amazon Ads is rolling out Brand+, a new offering for marketers combining "trillions of signals" from shopping, browsing and streaming across Amazon platforms.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.

t: Amazon Has a New Way to Prove That TV Ads Drive Sales
s: January 27, 2025 - Amazon wants to prove that its video ads actually work. Brand+, a new ad-targeting tool in Amazon’s demand-side platform, or Amazon DSP, emerged from beta today.
